name: Date Time Quantity
validation_rules:
- Date: Required, cannot be future date
- Time: Required, valid 24-hour format
- Quantity: Required, positive number, decimal allowed
- Units displayed based on metric configuration
- Default quantity suggestions based on metric type
- Unit-specific validation (e.g., grams 0-1000, servings 0-10)

- Time Start: Required, valid 24-hour format
- Time End: Required, must be after Time Start

- Maximum 24-hour duration validation

name: Binary Choice
validation_rules:
- Boolean: Required selection
- Toggle switch or checkbox interface
- Clear Yes/No or Complete/Incomplete labeling
- Optional: 'Skip' option for missed days

description: Tracks subjective ratings or scores - requires scale selection. Used for mood, energy, pain levels, sleep quality, or other subjective assessments.
name: Scale Rating
validation_rules:
- Scale: Required, integer 1-5
- Visual scale with clear descriptors
- Scale labels defined per metric type
- Optional: Allow half-point ratings (1.5, 2.5, etc.)

description: Tracks daily or weekly occurrence counts - requires date and count number. Used for social interactions, mobility sessions, meal frequency, or any countable events.

name: Frequency Count
validation_rules:
- Date: Required, cannot be future date
- Count: Required, positive integer
- Maximum reasonable daily/weekly limits per metric type
- Default value: 0
- Increment/decrement buttons for easy entry

description: Tracks events with multiple category/type options - requires date, time, and category selection. Used for caffeine types, exercise types, food categories where the specific type matters.
name: Multi-Category Selection
validation_rules:
- Date: Required, cannot be future date
- Time: Required, valid 24-hour format
- Type: At least one selection required from predefined options
- Optional quantity per category
- 'Other' option with text input available

description: Derived metrics calculated from other inputs - read-only display. Used for consistency scores, efficiency metrics, trend analysis, or any computed values.
name: Calculated Metric
validation_rules:
- Read-only display for users
- Auto-calculated via background processes
- Clear data source indication
- Calculation frequency definition
- Historical trend display available

description: Combines multiple sub-components into single score - requires multiple rating inputs. Used for sleep environment (temperature + darkness + sound) or other multi-factor assessments.
name: Composite Score
validation_rules:
- Multiple sub-component inputs required
- Each component validated separately
- Auto-calculation of composite score
- Display breakdown of individual components
- Sub-component weights defined per metric
